lines.text: [Pat's bloodhounds dig into what appears to be a grave]
What would quicklime be doin' out here?
It's usually used to destroy something... Look! A cow's hoof!
I wonder where the rest of the cow is.
I imagine it's attached to the hoof.
[while on the trail of a wanted fugitive, Roy and Pat stop to tend to a sick calf]
You don't take a hint very well, do you, Rogers? You're on McKenzie property. Hope you have permission.
Sorry, we didn't have time. We're on a manhunt.
Looks to me like you're on a calf hunt. I'd say you were doin' a little rustling!
[Steve Paxton dies from wounds received from a posse]
This is what happens to kids who think they can fight the world all alone... that won't listen to parents or those that love them.
